sentence.Network_en: It would not prove worthwhile to instigate a nuclear attack.
sentence.Network_cn: 挑起核攻击最终是不值得的.

sentence.Network_en: His object was to instigate a little rebellion on the part of the bishop.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的目的是,在主教方面煽起一场小小的造反.

sentence.Network_en: Possibly is receives the media to instigate only then such the extreme.
sentence.Network_cn: 可能是受到媒体的挑拨才这么极端.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... stimulation n 刺激，鼓励 instigate v 教唆，煽动 stain v 尽力拉；工作过度.
杨子江GRE填空讲义_百度文库 ... be oneself 大方 instigate 鼓动积极类词汇 enthusiasm 热情.
字典中怂字的解释 ... (2) 同本义[ terrify] (4) 怂恿[ instigate] 怂 sǒng.
调_百度百科 ... [frequency modulation (FM)] 调频广播 [instigate；stir up] 挑拨；调唆。 [mediate] 调停。.

list.abs: if the instigated person does not commit the instigated crime , the instigator may be a lesser punishment or a mitigated punishment .如果被教唆的人没有犯被教唆的罪，对于教唆犯，可以从轻或者减轻处罚。
instigation 鼓动instigation therapy 鼓舞治疗法instigator 激励者
英语语言词典  # 翻译 ... ... 主谋者 principal conspirator;principal plotter 主谋 chief instigator;head of a conspiracy.
dream ego 梦中自我dream instigator 梦之缘起dream interpretation 梦的解释梦之解析

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the sense 'urge on'): from Latin instigat- 'urged, incited', from the verb instigare, from in- 'towards' + stigare 'prick, incite'

entry.def: Someone who instigates an event causes it to happen.

example.ex: Jenkinson instigated a refurbishment of the old gallery...
example.tran: 詹金森促成了老美术馆的重新整修。

example.ex: The violence over the last forty-eight hours was instigated by ex-members of the secret police.
example.tran: 过去 48 小时的暴力事件是在前秘密警察的煽动下爆发的。

sentences.sentence: "set off great unrest among the people"

means.word_mean: 2. serve as the inciting cause of;

sentences.sentence: "She prompted me to call my relatives"

auth_sentence.content: Both use the arts to instigate social change.
auth_sentence.res_content: Both use the arts to instigate social change.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Both use the arts to instigate social change.

auth_sentence.content: You must not instigate your elders to a breach of faith.
auth_sentence.res_content: You must not instigate your elders to a breach of faith.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You must not instigate your elders to a breach of faith.

auth_sentence.content: Huckabee threatened to instigate impeachment proceedings if Tucker failed to step aside.
auth_sentence.res_content: Huckabee threatened to instigate impeachment proceedings if Tucker failed to step aside.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Huckabee threatened to instigate impeachment proceedings if Tucker failed to step aside.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =prick,表示"刺,刺激"; 2. 引申为火焰

stems_affixes.value_cn: 清楚的,明显的;[from]截然不同的
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis分开+stinct刺,刺激→把刺分开→明显的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 特别的;有特色的;与众不同的
stems_affixes.word_buile: distinct[adj.清楚的,明显的;[from]截然不同的]+ive表形容词→adj.特别的;有特色的;与众不同的
instinct[n.本能,直觉,天性]+ive表形容词→adj.本能的
distinct清楚的,明显的+ly表副词→adv.清楚地, 显然

stems_affixes.value_cn: 区别,差别;级别;特性;声望;显赫
stems_affixes.word_buile: distinct[adj.清楚的,明显的;[from]截然不同的]+ion表名词→n.区别,差别;级别;特性;声望;显赫
in内+stinct刺,刺激→内在的刺激,本能
in内+stig=stinct刺,刺激+ate使……→刺激别人内部→煽动

sentences.en: It would not prove worthwhile to instigate a nuclear attack.
sentences.cn: 挑起核攻击最终是不值得的。
